title: Flash Sale: Get 20TB of cloud storage for just $90
description:
Everybody today needs cloud storage to handle their data. Our devices simply don’t have enough storage space to handle our entire digital lives, making cloud storage an essential tool. But it doesn’t have to be an expensive one, especially during our St. Paddy’s Day Flash Sale. This 48-hour sale is running until 11:59 pm PT on March 17, and until then, you can get a lifetime subscription to 20TB of Prism Drive Secure Cloud Storage for just $89.97.

Prism Drive utilizes AES 256-bit and HTTP

title: 48 hours only: save $450 on Microsoft Visual Studio
description:
Developers today have more ways to build and collaborate than ever. Sometimes, though, that can get overwhelming. That’s why a tool like Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 for Windows is so useful. This fully-featured 64-bit IDE makes it easier to collaborate and work through complex projects, and for the next 48 hours, you can get it for just $39.97.
